casebody.data:
State ex rel. Cincinnati Enquirer
v.
Pike Cty. Coroner's Office. 2016-1115 Supreme Court of Ohio. April 25, 2018 Frank D. Celebrezze Jr., J., of the Eighth District Court of Appeals, sitting for French, J. Robin N. Piper, J., of the Twelfth District Court of Appeals, sitting for DeWine, J.

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

O'Donnell and Kennedy, JJ., dissent.

RECONSIDERATION OF PRIOR DECISIONS

On motion for reconsideration. Motion denied.
